subject: Baseball
Radio
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Keiter spent 50 years as a sportscaster but was best remembered for his recreating San Francisco Giants baseball games for abandoned fans from the Polo Grounds years.
snippet: Mr. Keiter spent 50 years as a sportscaster but was best remembered for his recreating San Francisco Giants baseball games for abandoned fans from the Polo Grounds years.
